It's actually not a book, it's a Ph.D. thesis done under John Archibald
Wheeler at Princeton. It does not imply that there is no objective reality.
I guess you have to know a lot about physics to really understand what it's
saying. And I don't think it's a perfect theory, either. It has flaws, as
all of them seem to.

Zack
